reactor.tcp.spec

Class TcpServerSpec<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.core.spec.support.DispatcherComponentSpec<SPEC,TARGET>
      • reactor.core.spec.support.EventRoutingComponentSpec<TcpServerSpec<IN,OUT>,TcpServer<IN,OUT>>
        • reactor.tcp.spec.TcpServerSpec<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type that will be received by this client
    OUT - The type that will be sent by this client
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    reactor.function.Supplier<TcpServer<IN,OUT>>

    public class TcpServerSpec<IN,OUT>
extends reactor.core.spec.support.EventRoutingComponentSpec<TcpServerSpec<IN,OUT>,TcpServer<IN,OUT>>
    A TcpServerSpec is used to specify a TcpServer
